sect1.title: Moving files
sect1.para: Moving files: One of the (many?) complaints against cvs is that it has no concept of 1) moving files or 2) versioning directories. If you need to move a file, it's generally better to do it on the server manually. If this is needed, please contact me and I'll do it. This is simply because then if something goes wrong, it's me who takes the fall instead of anyone else!
